metadata.Title: CVE-2017-6833 on Ubuntu 16.04 ESM (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description:
The runPull function in libaudiofile/modules/BlockCodec.cpp in Audio FileLibrary (aka audiofile) 0.3.6 allows remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (divide-by-zero error and crash) via a crafted file.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2017-6833` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

audiofile-tools - 0.3.6-2ubuntu0.16.04.1
libaudiofile1 - 0.3.6-2ubuntu0.16.04.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: audiofile package in xenial was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.3.6-2ubuntu0.16.04.1').
